com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.tone_analyzer.v3

Class ToneAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.tone_analyzer.v3.ToneAnalyzer

  • public class ToneAnalyzer
extends WatsonService
    The IBM Watson Tone Analyzer service uses linguistic analysis to detect emotional tones, social propensities, and writing styles in written communication. Then it offers suggestions to help the writer improve their intended language tones.
    See Also:
    Tone Analyzer

      • ToneAnalyzer

        public ToneAnalyzer(java.lang.String versionDate)
        Instantiates a new tone analyzer.

        versionDate - The version date (yyyy-MM-dd) of the REST API to use. Specifying this value will keep your API calls from failing when the service introduces breaking changes.

      • ToneAnalyzer

        public ToneAnalyzer(java.lang.String versionDate,
            java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String password)
        Instantiates a new tone analyzer with username and password.
        Parameters:
        versionDate - The version date (yyyy-MM-dd) of the REST API to use. Specifying this value will keep your API calls from failing when the service introduces breaking changes.
        username - the username
        password - the password

    • Method Detail

      • getTone

        public ServiceCall<ToneAnalysis> getTone(java.lang.String text,
                                ToneOptions options)
        Analyzes the "tone" of a piece of text. The message is analyzed from several tones (social tone, emotional tone, writing tone), and for each of them various traits are derived (such as conscientiousness, agreeableness, openness).
        Parameters:
        text - The text to analyze
        options - The ToneOptions options
        Returns:
        the ToneAnalysis with the response

      • getChatTone

        public ServiceCall<UtterancesTone> getChatTone(ToneChatRequest chatInput)
        Analyzes the "tone" of a list of utterances in a conversation. The text is analyzed from several chat tones, and confidence score is given back for tones which are present in the text
        Parameters:
        chatInput - The object which has the JSON to analyze
        Returns:
        the UtterancesTone with the response
